Service Details: - Provides integrative, person-directed residential and community supports for individuals with developmental disabilities - Offers Globally Funded Programs for Youth, ages 12-19 years, Adults, ages 19 and up, and Support Programs - Offers Fee-for-Service Programs - Offers Individualized Funding Programs
How to Apply: - Adult referral: Community Living British Columbia (CLBC)- Youth referral: Ministry of Children and Family Development (MCFD) - Self-referral for fee-for-service programs
